resources.string: You are below average results on this category. Move on you can improve yourself !
You may be able to be better than average with a little effort !
You are in the average results. Try to stand out by surpassing yourself !
Your results are quite good, keep going on !
You are doing way better than average people, congrats !
Unfortunately, you made worse than your last session. Don\'t let yourself down !
You should be able to improve. Don\'t let bad habits set up !
A small improvement has been seen, keep going on !
You improved your skills for sure, congrats !
You can be proud of you, you smashed your last session results !
You should go for a more intensive session next time, you will get better results !
You should go for a more intensive session next time, you will get better results !
Try to run faster as you see the finish line, you can definetly save time
Try to run faster as you see the finish line, you can definetly save time
A successful sport session should make you feel like this ! Try to get the same results and feel better before increase intensity !
A successful sport session should make you feel like this ! Try to get the same results and feel better before increase intensity !
You should start your session by running slower, you will be able to stay more consistent !
You should start your session by running slower, you will be able to stay more consistent !
Try to breathe more often when you\'re running, you\'ll feel better !
Try to breathe more often when you\'re running, you\'ll feel better !
You\'ve made a more intensive session, try to figure out if it was worth it !
Your session was a bit more intensive, was it positive ?
Your efforts are consistent, try to get better results !
You\'ve made a less intensive session, if your results are similar to the last session, surpass yourself to improve !
You\'ve managed to make a less intensive session, try to improve your results by making a more intensive session !
